sentences.en: " Pass me that sock. I'll join you,'said I, running over to him.
sentences.cn: “ 把那只给我, 我也捉厂我一边说着朝他跑过去.

sentences.en: a pair of socks
sentences.cn: 一双短袜

sentences.en: A sock show can make a million.
sentences.cn: 一场成功的演出可以赚一百万.

sentences.en: Can't you put a sock in it? I'm trying to work.
sentences.cn: 别出声了好 不好 ?我要工作呢.

sentences.en: Come on, lads. Sock it to 'em.
sentences.cn: 来吧，伙计们，让他们开开眼。

sentences.en: fog that socked in the airport.
sentences.cn: 迫使机场关闭的大雾

sentences.en: He gave his sock a hitch when he fell It'slipping down.
sentences.cn: 他感觉袜子向下滑时,猛拉了一下.

sentences.en: He groped around in the dark for his other sock.
sentences.cn: 他在黑暗中到处瞎摸找另一只袜子。

sentences.en: He is trying to sock a little money away.
sentences.cn: 他在想办法存一点钱.

sentences.en: He put a sock in it.
sentences.cn: 他安静下来了.

sentences.en: He socked her in the face.
sentences.cn: 他猛地一拳打在她脸上。

sentences.en: Hung - chien sighed,'sometimes I really wish I could sock you once. "
sentences.cn: 鸿 渐 叹气道: “ 有时候,我真恨不能打你一顿. ”

sentences.en: Once, after a boy made a comment, she socked him.
sentences.cn: 有一次，一个男孩子发表了一点意见，她就挥拳猛击他。

sentences.en: Please darn the hole in my sock.
sentences.cn: 请缝补一下我袜子上的小洞.

sentences.en: she acted her socks off.
sentences.cn: 她全力以赴地行动。

sentences.en: She needled the wool rapidly through the sock she was mending.
sentences.cn: 她很快地用针线缝补着袜子.

sentences.en: Sock Shop was one of the high-street success stories of the 80s.
sentences.cn: “袜铺”是20世纪80年代商业成功的范例之一。

sentences.en: the beach was socked in with fog.
sentences.cn: 海滩被浓雾所笼罩。

sentences.en: The hole in your sock shows above your shoe.
sentences.cn: 你袜子上有个洞,正好露在鞋边上.

sentences.en: Tom's big toe is showing through a hole in his sock.
sentences.cn: 汤姆的大脚拇趾从袜子的洞里露了出来.

sentences.en: white ankle socks
sentences.cn: 白色的齐踝短袜

sentences.en: you'll need to sock away about $900 a month.
sentences.cn: 你需要每月存大约900美元。

sentences.en: You've worn a hole in your sock.
sentences.cn: 你把袜子磨了个洞.

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)给某人留下印象；使某人吃惊
(非正式)努力改善自己的工作（表现或行为）
储钱：为将来使用而把（钱）放在安全的地方
竭尽全力对付某人：给别人以强有力的评论、训斥或身体上的打击
(非正式)攻击；给某人留下深刻的印象

trans.tran_cn: 短袜，（尤指用拳头）猛击，重击
trans.tran_en: a piece of clothing made of soft material that you wear on your foot inside your shoe
a piece of clothing made of soft material that you wear on your foot inside your shoe
to hit someone very hard, especially with your hand closed
